skins.shipDescription: Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number four - Akatsuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am... the Sakura Empire's Akatsuki-class type III destroyer, Inazuma. As the youngest of my class, I participated in a lot of battles in the World War. But I prefer escorts, transports, and rescues over combat. ... Commander? Would you like to have your head patted too?
skins.acquisition: Are you the commander...? You don't seem very reliable... Ah, sorry, my self-introduction. My name is... Inazuma.
skins.login: Is that... you, Commander? I can't believe you're logging in at this time of day... shouldn't you be doing something else?
skins.details: Commander... it seems you're always holed up in your room...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, your biggest flaw is how kind you are.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Naka... she's helped me quite a lot...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... could you pat my head?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... there's no medicine that can fix you.

skins.shipDescription: It doesn’t matter if Inazuma becomes Mr. Commander's dessert… but if Inazuma cannot be found, Mr. Commander will feel so devastated, perhaps he won’t be able to command the fleet… so… please! Please convey Inazuma's heartfelt wish to Mr. Commander――
skins.acquisition: It doesn’t matter if Inazuma becomes Mr. Commander's dessert… but if Inazuma cannot be found, Mr. Commander will feel so devastated, perhaps he won’t be able to command the fleet… so… please! Please convey Inazuma's heartfelt wish to Mr. Commander――
skins.login: ...Inazuma’s heartfelt wish, has it been communicated? …Mr. Commander...
skins.details: Mr. Commander, after you swallowed Inazuma up... you must be ready to sortie.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Are you trying to find Inazuma, Mr. Commander? Inazuma is right in front of you.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Mr. Commander, you’re always so gentle...
skins.secretaryTouch: Mr. Commander, are we starting this… please accept all of Inazuma, both the good and the bad―
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Mr. Commander, have you heard Inazuma’s heartfelt words? You’re really amazing Mr. Commander!

skins.shipDescription: I usually go to festivals with Ikazuchi, but this would be my first time going with you. Hmm? Where should we visit first?
skins.acquisition: I usually go to festivals with Ikazuchi, but this would be my first time going with you. Hmm? Where should we visit first?
skins.login: I was beginning to think that you forgot about our plans, Commander.
skins.details: Commander, you didn't just buy these clothes for me because Ikazuchi asked you to, right? It doesn't bother me. Not one bit...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'd like some taiyaki. Is that okay?
skins.secretaryIdle2: It feels unexpectedly nice to walk around without my shoes... Commander, why don't you try it too?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you can go check out everyone's yukatas if you'd like. I'll look around by myself first.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, no matter how much you poke me, I won't have any Live2D.

skins.shipDescription: I'm the fairy of lightning that illuminates the stars in the night sky... So that's what we're going with, huh. Commander, will you accompany me to the party?
